Package freenet.crypt

Interface Summary
BlockCipher Defines the interface that must be implemented by symmetric block ciphers used in the Freenet cryptography architecture
CryptoElement This is a highest level interface for all crypto objects.
Digest  
 

Class Summary
CryptoKey  
DHGroup Holds a Diffie-Hellman key-exchange group
DiffieHellman  
DiffieHellmanLightContext  
DSA Implements the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) described in FIPS-186
DSAGroup Holds DSA group parameters.
DSAPrivateKey  
DSAPublicKey  
DSASignature  
DummyRandomSource  
EncryptingIoAdapter IoAdapter proxy using Rijndael (256 bit key, 256 bit block) in CTR mode.
EntropySource A token used as an argument to a RandomSource's acceptTimerEntropy.
Global This class contains global public keys used by Freenet.
HMAC Implements the HMAC Keyed Message Authentication function, as described in the draft FIPS standard.
KeyAgreementSchemeContext  
PCFBMode Control mechanism for the Periodic Cipher Feed Back mode.
RandomSource Interface for any random-number source in Freenet
RijndaelPCFBMode Optimised PCFBMode for Rijndael.
SHA1 This is a simple port of Steve Reid's SHA-1 code into Java.
SHA256  
SSL  
Util  
Yarrow An implementation of the Yarrow PRNG in Java.
 

Exception Summary
CryptFormatException  
UnsupportedCipherException
